name: Gonzo tales
description: A few months ago a friend of mine went hunting for the ghost of Marcos Perez JÃ­menez's girlfriend, according to his informants, the ghost lives in one of the rooms of the Humboldt Hotel on the top of Avila Mountain.  His camera died in the middle of the journeyand I don't know if he ever found the creature. Much less what would have happened in that encounter, I only know that he suddenly left for Argentina and now he can be found wandering through La Recoleta during twilight.  Recently, stories of a ghost haunting the rooms of the Humboldt Hotel came to my desk. It seems the apparition is taking pictures of everyone she finds in her way with a ghost camera...
